title: Govt borrowings unlikely to crowd out private sector, says finance secretary TV Somanathan - Economic Times
content: Govt borrowings unlikely to crowd out private sector, says finance secretary TV Somanathan  Economic Times
description: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman pegged the government's gross borrowing for FY23 at Rs 14.9 lakh crore, compared with a downward revised Rs 10.5 lakh crore in FY22, in her February 1 budget, which put capital expenditure at the centre of a plan to bolster the economy.
